definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: India’s case was that of a 23-year-old who arrived in Hyderabad from New York.
sentences.chinese: 印度的患者是一名23歲從紐約到海德拉巴的青年人。

sentences.english: The forth episode of the coiled. riot, Eveline vividly demonstrates a kind of emotion paralysis in Dublin youngsters.
sentences.chinese: 生動地表現了都柏林青年人癱瘓的精神狀態。

sentences.english: It is always good for young people to be put upon exerting themselves.
sentences.chinese: 讓青年人自己去闖闖總是有好處的。

sentences.english: 《Robber 》reflected the youth revolting the feudalism system.
sentences.chinese: 《強盜》反映了青年人對封建專制制度的反抗。

sentences.english: Young people must be taught to learn the differnces between good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 必須教導青年人學會區分善與惡。

sentences.english: Only Youth could rise, and Sandel rose.
sentences.chinese: 只有青年人能夠站起來，桑德爾終於站起來了。

sentences.english: The bonds between 2011's islands of youth dissent remain limited.
sentences.chinese: 2011年持異議的青年人島嶼之間的聯繫仍然有限。

sentences.english: The normal value of dark adaptation of adults was within 50 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 青年人暗適應時問正常值在50秒以內。

sentences.english: The cooperative model enables young people to create and manage sustainable enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 合作社模式能使青年人創造並管理可持續的企業。

sentences.english: Then came the summer, and restlessness seized these young people.
sentences.chinese: 夏日來臨，這些青年人閒不住了。

sentences.english: The ancient “Book of Songs” needs to be reinterpreted for the young people.
sentences.chinese: 對青年人來說，古代的《詩經》需要做新的解釋。

sentences.english: At this moment the young man returned; Danglars withdrew.
sentences.chinese: 這時，那青年人回來了，騰格拉爾便乘機溜走了。

sentences.english: That futile young man does nothing but waste money.
sentences.chinese: 那個沒出息的青年人只會浪費錢。

sentences.english: We are reaching the youth of the world through social media.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過社交媒體與全球的青年人進行交流。

sentences.english: One of those young people is Erica Lopez.
sentences.chinese: 這些青年人是埃裏卡洛佩茲。

sentences.english: On every front there are young people abounding in vigor and vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在各條戰線上都有精力充沛朝氣蓬勃的青年人。

definition: lit. robust years/prime of life/summer/able-bodied (fit for military service)/mature (talent, garden etc)
